mapper.insert:
insert into c_supplier(id,code,name,feermain,account,email,mobil) values
(#{item.id,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.supplierCode, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierName, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierFeerPrice,javaType=Double,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.supplierAccount, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierEmail, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierPhone, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
